MediaRecorderError_event.summary: The interface's error event is fired when an error occurs: for example because recording wasn't allowed or was attempted using an unsupported codec.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.

MediaRecorderError_event.value:
A function to be called whenever an error occurs during the recorder's lifetime. In
addition to other general errors that might occur, the following errors are specifically
possible when using the MediaStream Recording API; to determine which occurred, check
the value of .These errors may occur either directly because of a call to a
MediaRecorder method, or indirectly due to a problem arising during the
recording process.
